ans = []                            # create an empty list to hold result
    listt = [x for x in range(1,m+1)]   # create the permutation
    for q in queries:                   # iterate over each element from queries
        ans.append(listt.index(q))      # append the index of query value from the permutation
        listt.remove(q)                 # remove the element from the permutataion
